job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI/ML Engineer Specializing in Large Language Models (Llms)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
XABLU is seeking a Medior/Senior AI Developer with expertise in a wide range of AI technologies, including Large Language Models (LLMs). We are at the forefront of providing AI-driven solutions with practical utility for business. We are seeking a highly skilled AI Developer to join our dynamic team. This role is crucial in developing and integrating AI technologies across multiple products. Responsibilities include developing, testing, and maintaining AI solutions, ensuring code quality, and working on innovative AI applications like chatbots and advanced data analysis tools. Strong communication and teamwork are essential. XABLU offers a diverse, collaborative work environment with ample opportunities for personal and professional growth.
       What is the position?
       We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI/ML Engineer with a passion for developing and working with Large Language Models (LLMs). The ideal candidate will be responsible for testing and integrating various open-source models into our wide range of products, ensuring that our solutions are not only innovative but also robust and user-friendly.
       What are you going to do?
       Key Responsibilities
          + Develop, test, and maintain Large Language Models for various applications.
          + Evaluate and integrate open-source AI/ML models into our product suite
          + Work closely with the product development team to implement AI features in our contract drafting tool, chatbot, and other products.
          + Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI/ML technologies, particularly in the realm of LLMs
          + Collaborate with the data science team to improve model performance and accuracy
          + Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members (interns)
          + Document and present research findings and development processes
       Join us in our journey to redefine the boundaries of AI and ML, and help us create smarter solutions for a smarter world!
       You will be part of an ambitious and growing organization that aims to create the best training and consultancy services for cross-platform mobile app development. You'll work on several different projects and integrate the most relevant solutions.
       Who are we looking for?, XABLU is a leader in cross-platform mobile app development and consultancy. From boosting our clients' development teams to helping them refine their mobile strategy: we are there to support them with all of their app development needs. In addition, we host events where developers can talk about technology, hack and socialize. We are known for our deep expertise in the Microsoft Xamarin (.NET Maui) mobile ecosystem as well as our signature friendly and efficient team approach.
       We also have internal projects we are developing: one is a user-centered platform combined with blockchain, and the other is a platform with a lot of automation challenges! We are continuously integrating AI/ML tooling in the products we develop.
       Within XABLU, team and communication is our top priority and we embrace different cultures as well as different geo-locations. At XABLU, you'll be working in an environment where you can express your talents, ideas and personality. You'll be pushed by your colleagues to develop yourself and the team in an informal and fun atmosphere.
       Your Profile
job_details.full_text:
AI/ML Engineer Specializing in Large Language Models (Llms)

XABLU is seeking a Medior/Senior AI Developer with expertise in a wide range of AI technologies, including Large Language Models (LLMs). We are at the forefront of providing AI-driven solutions with practical utility for business. We are seeking a highly skilled AI Developer to join our dynamic team. This role is crucial in developing and integrating AI technologies across multiple products. Responsibilities include developing, testing, and maintaining AI solutions, ensuring code quality, and working on innovative AI applications like chatbots and advanced data analysis tools. Strong communication and teamwork are essential. XABLU offers a diverse, collaborative work environment with ample opportunities for personal and professional growth.
       What is the position?
       We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI/ML Engineer with a passion for developing and working with Large Language Models (LLMs). The ideal candidate will be responsible for testing and integrating various open-source models into our wide range of products, ensuring that our solutions are not only innovative but also robust and user-friendly.
       What are you going to do?
       Key Responsibilities
          + Develop, test, and maintain Large Language Models for various applications.
          + Evaluate and integrate open-source AI/ML models into our product suite
          + Work closely with the product development team to implement AI features in our contract drafting tool, chatbot, and other products.
          + Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI/ML technologies, particularly in the realm of LLMs
          + Collaborate with the data science team to improve model performance and accuracy
          + Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members (interns)
          + Document and present research findings and development processes
       Join us in our journey to redefine the boundaries of AI and ML, and help us create smarter solutions for a smarter world!
       You will be part of an ambitious and growing organization that aims to create the best training and consultancy services for cross-platform mobile app development. You'll work on several different projects and integrate the most relevant solutions.
       Who are we looking for?, XABLU is a leader in cross-platform mobile app development and consultancy. From boosting our clients' development teams to helping them refine their mobile strategy: we are there to support them with all of their app development needs. In addition, we host events where developers can talk about technology, hack and socialize. We are known for our deep expertise in the Microsoft Xamarin (.NET Maui) mobile ecosystem as well as our signature friendly and efficient team approach.
       We also have internal projects we are developing: one is a user-centered platform combined with blockchain, and the other is a platform with a lot of automation challenges! We are continuously integrating AI/ML tooling in the products we develop.
       Within XABLU, team and communication is our top priority and we embrace different cultures as well as different geo-locations. At XABLU, you'll be working in an environment where you can express your talents, ideas and personality. You'll be pushed by your colleagues to develop yourself and the team in an informal and fun atmosphere.
       Your Profile

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs), including developing, testing, integrating, and fine-tuning them. It also mentions building applications like chatbots and contract drafting tools, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on generative models and user-facing applications.

job_tasks.task: Develop, test, and maintain Large Language Models for various applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development, testing, and maintenance of LLMs, which falls under the core modeling activities for generative AI.

job_tasks.task: Evaluate and integrate open-source AI/ML models into our product suite
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and integrating models, especially open-source ones, is a key part of adapting and applying them to specific product needs, fitting the modeling category.

job_tasks.task: Work closely with the product development team to implement AI features in our contract drafting tool, chatbot, and other products.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing AI features into specific products like a contract drafting tool and chatbot requires software development skills to integrate the AI components into user-facing applications.

job_tasks.task: Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI/ML technologies, particularly in the realm of LLMs
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies in a rapidly evolving field like AI/ML and LLMs.

job_tasks.task: Collaborate with the data science team to improve model performance and accuracy
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to work with another team (data science) to achieve a common goal (model improvement), indicating collaboration.

job_tasks.task: Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members (interns)
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical leadership and mentorship suggests taking initiative and responsibility for guiding others, aligning with ownership and leadership aspects.

job_tasks.task: Document and present research findings and development processes
job_tasks.justification: Documenting and presenting findings requires clear communication of technical information to various audiences.

job_tasks.task: developing and integrating AI technologies across multiple products
job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies the practical application and integration of AI technologies into existing or new products, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.task: developing, testing, and maintaining AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: Developing, testing, and maintaining AI solutions in a production context aligns with the operational aspects of MLOps.
Ensuring code quality is a fundamental aspect of robust software development.

job_tasks.task: working on innovative AI applications like chatbots and advanced data analysis tools
job_tasks.justification: Working on applications like chatbots and advanced data analysis tools, especially when focused on the AI/ML aspects, involves modeling and generative techniques.

job_tasks.task: Strong communication and teamwork are essential.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement about the importance of communication and teamwork.

soft_skills.skill: Strong communication and teamwork are essential.
Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI/ML technologies
Document and present research findings and development processes
